statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_date, amount, sender_address FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT receiver_address, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE sender_address = '123 Main St';
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE contract_id = 'a8b4ac59-1b58-4c96-8d13-0d6f17d69005';
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address FROM transaction_history WHERE amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT transaction_id, contract_id, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_id ASC
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address FROM transaction_history WHERE contract_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE sender_address LIKE '%A%' AND receiver_address LIKE '%B%'
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE sender_address != receiver_address ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT * FROM transaction_history;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_history;
SELECT product_id, seller_id, buyer_id FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM data_immutability;
SELECT product_name, creation_date FROM data_immutability ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT seller_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transaction_history GROUP BY seller_id;
SELECT buyer_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_transaction_amount FROM transaction_history GROUP BY buyer_id HAVING AVG(transaction_amount) > 1000;
SELECT th.transaction_id, di.product_name FROM transaction_history th JOIN data_immutability di ON th.product_id = di.product_id;

SELECT th.buyer_id, count(*) AS total_transactions, MAX(di.creation_date) AS latest_product_creation_date FROM transaction_history th JOIN data_immutability di ON th.product_id = di.product_id GROUP BY th.buyer_id;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, price FROM transaction_history WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT data_name, data_value FROM data_immutable WHERE data_name LIKE 'user%';
SELECT * FROM smart_contract WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, contract_address FROM smart_contract ORDER BY contract_name;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_id = 100;
SELECT product_id, timestamp FROM transaction_history WHERE price > 100.00 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT data_name, data_value FROM data_immutable WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-06-30 23:59:59';
SELECT contract_name, contract_address FROM smart_contract ORDER BY contract_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history JOIN data_immutable ON transaction_history.product_id = data_immutable.data_id WHERE data_name = 'example';
SELECT * FROM user WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user WHERE joined_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT contract_name, contract_balance FROM smart_contract WHERE deploy_date < '2022-03-15' ORDER BY contract_balance DESC;
SELECT data_type, data_value FROM data_immutable WHERE data_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_type FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM user WHERE user_id > 5 ORDER BY joined_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, email FROM user WHERE joined_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY joined_date;
SELECT data_id, data_type, data_value FROM data_immutable WHERE data_type = 'image' AND data_value LIKE '%jpg%' ORDER BY created_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT contract_name, contract_balance FROM smart_contract WHERE contract_balance > 1000 ORDER BY contract_balance DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_type IN ('deposit', 'withdrawal') ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 7;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_type = 'Sale';
SELECT transaction_id, user_address, transaction_amount FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, registration_date FROM user_account WHERE last_login_date IS NULL;
SELECT data_id, data_type, data_value FROM data_immutability WHERE data_type LIKE '%info%';
SELECT product_id, product_name, supplier_address FROM supply_chain WHERE manufacturer_address = '123xyz';
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_address, registration_date FROM user_account WHERE user_name LIKE '%John%' AND registration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturer_address, supplier_address FROM supply_chain ORDER BY product_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, contract_address, contract_created_at FROM smart_contract WHERE contract_updated_at IS NULL ORDER BY contract_created_at DESC LIMIT 3;
